item.description:
Meetup is to play for ~ 1/2 hour or more at a new Open Mike at Legends in Waltham. The Open Mike started last week on the 10th, by one of the 'band leaders' who plays at the Dommy Doyle Open Mike, where I am in the house band. The organizer invited me to play for 1/2 hour (weekly) with friends (yesterday).

So - anyone who would like to play - RSVP yes, let me know, and we can rehearse before then on Sunday from around 2 to 6 at a separate meetup. Or if you can't make it then, we'll set up a separate appointment. If you just want to come down and play without rehearsing, RSVP and let me know, and let me know what songs, so it can be arranged.

There is a drum set, backing band (if necessary) and we can do whatever you want (originals standards, etc)! We will be able to accomodate about 5 to 7 people in that time (drums, bass, lead guitar, (keys), other instruments and a few singer songwriters.) This can be a weekly event.

Anyone who wants can also come down to check it out, listen & have a beer - without RSVPing

group.name: The NEW England Singer Songwriter Musician Guild

item.name: Open Mike at Legends in Waltham
